record.description: Margaret Stinson, Miss University of Chicago, and two student hostesses present complimentary tickets to a St. Patrick's Day performance of the Playboy of the Western World to Sean Ronan, Irish consul general in Chicago. A six-day appearance of the Irish Players, a world renowned acting troupe, at Mandel Hall on the Midway campus starting March 17th is sponsored by the University of Chicago Alumni Association. Left to right: Barbara Flynn, Chicago; Norma Schmidt, Rockford, Illinois; Miss Stinson, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and Ronan.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
